name: project
description: Brief overview: Users can manage all the movies(name, introduce, rate, views) they watched, add new movies, delete movies, or update movies. This is a system to record your personal interest movie. Maybe it can suggest movies you would like.   # phase As a single user, movie system could login "/users/id" with name/ email/ phone/ username etc. BUT user connot delete the user information. Movies have home page "/movies",  fetch all the movies;  detail page "/movies/id", fetch a single movie by id; user page "/movies/id", fetch the users interested movies.
